features.title: Transactions and Account transactions filter feature
features.description: Filtering system for transactions and date filters for account transactions

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Secure login and registration system with JWT tokens

features.title: Transaction Management
features.description: Full CRUD operations for transactions with categories, tags, and payees

features.title: Refund Handling
features.description: Proper refund transaction handling with expense reduction logic

features.title: Dashboard & Analytics
features.description: Visual charts, spending insights, and financial overview

features.title: Budget Management
features.description: Monthly budget creation, tracking, and copying between months

features.title: Wallet & Account Management
features.description: Multiple wallet types and investment account support (TFSA, RRSP, FHSA)

features.title: Category Management
features.description: Custom category creation with color coding and type management

features.title: Data Import/Export
features.description: CSV transaction import and transfer system between wallets

features.title: Recurring Transactions
features.description: Automatic recurring transaction creation and management

features.title: Receipt Upload & OCR
features.description: Photo upload and OCR for receipt processing

features.title: Data Export & Backup
features.description: Export data to CSV, PDF, and backup functionality
